entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who claims to have done magic, but denies using it on Dudley. He is slightly less calm when questioned by Uncle Vernon.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is Harry's uncle who roars in anger and slams his fist down on the fridge, causing it to open. He questions Harry about using magic on Dudley.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is Harry's cousin who claims that Harry used magic on him and made everything dark. He shudders when describing the experience.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is Harry's aunt who makes flapping gestures at Harry to quiet him and asks Dudley to continue telling what happened.

relationships.description: Dudley claims that Harry used magic on him, making everything dark and causing strange things to be heard in his head.
Uncle Vernon questions Harry about using magic on Dudley, slamming his fist down on the fridge and causing it to open in anger.
Aunt Petunia makes flapping gestures at Harry to quiet him, indicating that she is trying to silence him.
